subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Carolina Kostner of Italy earned the Cup of Russia gold in Moscow, topping the error-strewn overnight leader, Fumie Suguri, with an elegant free skate. Suguri’s mistakes allowed the American Rachel Flatt to take the silver medal. Suguri of Japan finished third. Kostner and Suguri remain in contention for a Grand Prix Final berth heading into the sixth and final preliminary competition next week in Japan.
